channel.title: Lightning Communities on Salesforce Tek Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Lightning Communities on Salesforce Tek Talks

item.title: Lightning Web Component Community Case Creation
item.description: In this post we will create a case creation form, using the lightning-record-edit-form component alongside proper redirection to the record page once the button has been submitted. Getting Started You will need to get yourself setup with Salesforce-DX, if you haven’t had the chance to do so, this is a good time to get your environment setup since we will use it to deploy our LWC to a scratch org for testing.
